entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Leader
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:27 a.m. CST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Fog. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:17 AM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Fog dissipating. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating in the morning then mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:17 AM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023
